meaningMnemonic: You're <kanji>cool</kanji> and <kanji>quiet</kanji>. That's you, daddio. Nice and <vocabulary>cool-headed</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>calm</vocabulary>. So much <vocabulary>composure</vocabulary>
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
